73a3d7b8-70ec-4632-8753-15bfcc247d2e.description: Earner executed a professional and responsive email communication strategy that addressed potential and existing clients through appropriate communication channels.
73a3d7b8-70ec-4632-8753-15bfcc247d2e.name: HACIA U Powered by SHE: Customer Relationship Management - Marketing and Communication Certificate Spring 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Earner described an organization's approach to customer relationship management by summarizing the steps for executing an email campaign.

12985432-a2f9-4bf5-a6a2-da11b28e25d2.description: Earner researched the various entrepreneurial frameworks that can be used to determine the funding needs of a business, as well as what funding resources an entrepreneur might turn to at different phases of the business cycle.
12985432-a2f9-4bf5-a6a2-da11b28e25d2.name: HACIA U Powered by SHE: Funding Your Business - Entrepreneurship Certificate Spring 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Earner developed an action plan for an organization within one of the entrepreneurial frameworks (continuous learning, networking, building a team, knowing your value and putting in the work).
Earner developed and defined a startup financial model and identified the start-up costs for a selected organization.
Earner determined three funding sources for the different phases of development for their potential business.
Earner created a proposal for acquiring funds.

cd7eac67-821f-4c05-8320-257cfe740a55.description: Earner explored some of the legal aspects of starting and operating a business, identify sources of information that can help you stay current on regulatory requirements, and explore ways to ensure compliance within your industry, and review information on ethics and corporate social responsibility.
cd7eac67-821f-4c05-8320-257cfe740a55.name: HACIA U Powered by SHE: Legal and Compliance - Operations Management Certificate Spring 2022

c651ace8-52e0-40da-8f8a-e4f7711680c9.description: Earner assessed personal strengths and skills, external market analysis and market differentiators that differentiate the entrepreneurial efforts of an organization from others within the marketplace.

827ac282-bc1f-4e11-a956-9ef7c8a3baa0.description: Earner explored the power of marketing and the importance of identifying and knowing target markets by developing a marketing strategy to promote a business organization’s product or service by networking online and in their community.
